Text.val: 11.11.2014 AS SCR#19296 added missing call to BCM038 which checks if advance is allowed / not allowed
16.09.2014 SH SCR19153 Added BCM341 parameters PI.HUSR_ID and PO.CLNA_ID (both are skipped)
09.09.2014 AS SCR#19127 Checking GSBU(2104) before output of message CA9604
08.12.2004 MW SCR#7129 --> Disallowed for internal users
// Success, but request needs to be acknowledged ...
Advance request is ok and has been acknowledged by the user. We can save it.
Note that the user coul manipulate the parameter for acknowledgment but this is not an issue and has been diskussed with Jan
BCM038 gets called in any case to check the advance request, the "intermediate" screen was only implemented to avoid that
clients send requests without having checked it again (was originally a wish of some client users)
